headline: KEY HIGH VACUUM PRODUCTS MOLECULAR SIEVE FORELINE TRAP
description: Molecular Sieve Foreline Trap    Offers an extremely effective method for preventing   backstreaming of mechanical roughing pump oils
categories.lvl1: Vacuum Processing Equipment > Other Vacuum Equipment
specstable:
Manufacturer Key High Vacuum
Model MT300
Description Trap, Molecular Sieve, Foreline
Other Information
  • In and out tubes both 3" OD (tubulation "flange")
  • Chamber filled with synthetic Zeolite sieve material
    (sorptive capability is renewed by baking)
  • High absorption rate for oil and water vapors
  • Includes internal sieve reactivation heater
  • Constructed entirely of 304 stainless steel
Condition Like New
Weight 12 lb (5 kg)
